userIdInfo.title: User ID
userIdInfo.desc: Used to log in on the web and the MyVerizon app.

passwordInfo.title: Password
passwordInfo.desc: Pick a password to use with your Verizon login.

accountPinInfo.title: Account PIN
accountPinInfo.desc: An account PIN replaces the last four digits of the Account Owner's Social Security Number as the primary means of authentication on your account.

securityQuesInfo.title: Secret question
securityQuesInfo.desc: Used to verify your identity when logging in from a new device.
